name: Physics Fight - Local 2 Player Chaos
description:
Chaotic two player battles!

Battle it out with two players on the same keyboard going head to head with random wacky weapons ranging from regular pistols to snipers and even bouncy balls or pianos! All within a fully physics based world.

HOW TO PLAY WEAPONS
  • Shotgun
  • Tank Cannon
  • Portal Staff
  • Uzi
  • Piano
  • Missile
  • Boulder
  • Railgun
  • Bouncy Ball
  • Flamethrower
  • Cage
  • Pistol
  • Targeted Dash
  • Pistol
  • Sniper
  • + a rare secret weapon ;)

Thank you to my gameplay testers!

  • Harpooooon
  • MistaTeeJay
  • Skyler
  • Jensen
  • Trusten
